letters.description: Assess client's current libido, sexual health history, relationship dynamics, and identify potential underlying physical or psychological factors.
Develop a tailored plan addressing identified needs, incorporating education on sexual anatomy, function, response, and healthy sexual communication.
Implement practical techniques and exercises to enhance desire, arousal, orgasm, and overall sexual satisfaction. Focus on mindfulness, sensate focus, and communication skills.
Address relational dynamics impacting libido, fostering intimacy, communication, and resolving conflicts through collaborative strategies.
Establish long-term strategies for maintaining sexual well-being, incorporating self-care practices, regular check-ins, and ongoing relationship maintenance.
